channel.title: I need some help
channel.description:
well, im using the battlescape blitz source and when i run it a couple mins after something like this goes on the black screen [code] java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14654) at client.process(client.java:14638) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:175) at server.main(server.java:57) Disturbed Scape Server [fatal] - exception [/code]
can someone help me?

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @urballsrmine urballsrmine
item.description:
@urballsrmine wrote:

well, im using the battlescape blitz source and when i run it a couple mins after something like this goes on the black screen

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:14654)
        at client.process(client.java:14638)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:175)
        at server.main(server.java:57)
Disturbed Scape Server [fatal] - exception

can someone help me?

Read full topic
